overview: Focusing on former World Wave Champion Victor Fernandez and friends â€“ freestyle legend Goliito Estredo, Marcilio Browne, Klaas Voget and up-and-coming star Alessio Stillrich  - this new film concentrates on pure beauty in action, landscape and the ultimate sports lifestyle.
tagline: A feature Movie about one of the best Wavesailers and his Friends. Showing incredible Sailing and some of the most beautiful Beaches around the World.
title: Below the Surface
